name: Tragedy
description: A flawed hero's character defects lead to their downfall despite initial promise
examples: Romeo and Juliet, Macbeth, Breaking Bad

anticipation_stage.name: Anticipation Stage
anticipation_stage.description: The hero begins with promise but harbors a fatal flaw

dream_stage.name: Dream Stage
dream_stage.description: The hero achieves initial success and seems destined for greatness

frustration_stage.name: Frustration Stage
frustration_stage.description: The first serious obstacles appear, often due to the hero's flaw

nightmare_stage.name: Nightmare Stage
nightmare_stage.description: The hero's flaw consumes them, leading to destructive behavior

destruction.name: Destruction
destruction.description: The inevitable catastrophic end, often affecting others as well
